contents.text: Thank you for calling Pixlee, the user-generated content marketing platform based in San Francisco.
If you would like to speak with our Sales team, press 1.
To learn about pricing and subscription options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales department for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and subscription options for Pixlee’s marketing platform quickly.
Inquire about subscription pricing and any veteran-owned business discounts
I need detailed pricing tiers and API usage limits for Pixlee subscriptions.
I need help understanding the subscription costs and billing options.
I want a detailed cost breakdown of the various Pixlee subscription plans.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized product demo, press 2.
Please hold while we schedule your demo with one of our specialists.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized product demo of Pixlee’s user-generated content platform.
Schedule a personalized demo of Pixlee tailored for my small veteran-owned shop
I want to schedule a personalized demo to explore integration workflows and analytics features.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how Pixlee works.
I’d like to arrange a personalized walkthrough of Pixlee’s platform.

contents.text: If you need customer support, press 2.
For technical assistance and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with my Pixlee integration via support.
Get help troubleshooting image upload errors in my campaign dashboard
I need help debugging my Pixlee API integration errors.

contents.text: For help with content permissions and rights management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our permissions management team.

navigationGoals: Clarify content permissions and rights management for my UGC on Pixlee.
